<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Artisan](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=4)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 60 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

As an apprentice, you practiced a particular form of building or crafting, developing specialized skill. You might have been a blacksmith’s apprentice toiling over the forge for countless hours, a young tailor sewing garments of all kinds, or a shipwright shaping the hulls of ships.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Guild Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) skill feat.
